title: Create gaming PC peripheral showcase website

requirements.text: Create a homepage for www.spyderstild.shop that showcases high-end gaming peripherals with sections for mice, keyboards, and monitors

quotes: high-end gaming peripherals like mice, keyboards, and monitors

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays gaming peripheral categories: mice, keyboards, and monitors
Layout is organized with clear sections for each product category
Site is accessible at the root route

requirements.text: Implement a bold, futuristic visual theme with dark backgrounds, neon accents, sharp geometric shapes, and modern gaming-inspired typography throughout the entire website
acceptanceCriteria: Dark color scheme with vibrant neon accent colors (avoid blue and purple)
Modern, tech-inspired typography consistent across all pages
Cohesive futuristic aesthetic applied to all components

requirements.text: Create product showcase sections with visual cards for gaming mice, keyboards, and monitors with placeholder product information

quotes: gaming peripherals like mice, keyboards, and monitors

acceptanceCriteria: Each product category has dedicated showcase section
Product cards display placeholder images, names, and brief descriptions
Cards follow the futuristic design theme

requirements.text: Add navigation header with site branding for Spyderstild and links to product category sections
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links to mice, keyboards, and monitors sections
Header remains visible and follows futuristic design theme

requirements.text: Generate rendered images of the generated hero background, product category banners, and Spyderstild logo as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are saved to frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are referenced in the frontend code using correct paths
All generated images render correctly in the UI

constraints: Use only React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn components for frontend
Do not use blue or purple as primary theme colors
Keep all backend logic in single main.mo actor file
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including hooks and UI components
nonGoals: Implementing actual e-commerce functionality or payment processing
Creating a full product database or inventory system

required: Futuristic gaming hero background with dark tones, neon geometric patterns, and tech aesthetic (hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
Spyderstild logo with bold, angular lettering and gaming aesthetic in neon colors (spyderstild-logo.dim_400x120.png)
Gaming mouse category banner with futuristic neon highlights and dark background (mice-banner.dim_800x400.png)
Gaming keyboard category banner with RGB lighting effects and futuristic elements (keyboard-banner.dim_800x400.png)
Gaming monitor category banner with glowing screen effect and tech patterns (monitor-banner.dim_800x400.png)
